mapper.select: SELECT question_number, tu.user_number, question_title, question_content, question_date, question_viewcnt, question_status, last_update FROM tbl_question tq join tbl_user tu on tq.user_number = tu.user_number order by question_date asc limit #{startRow}, #{rowCount}

SELECT question_number, tg.gosu_number, question_title, question_content, question_date, question_viewcnt, question_status, last_update FROM tbl_question tq join tbl_gosu tg on tq.gosu_number = tg.gosu_number
